short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A calm ocean bathed in the soft glow of a vibrant sunset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The deep reds and oranges of the sky blend with gentle clouds, creating a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. This tranquil seascape not only soothes your eyes after long hours of work but also offers a refreshing connection to nature, making you feel as if you are immersed in the beauty of a serene evening by the ocean.
